# Central Command Staff Punitive Measures
[bold]Class 1.[/bold] (IAA, NTR, Magistrate) Central Command staff may confiscate any [color=#134975]NanoTrasen[/color] equipment in the possession of crew or [color=#1b67a5]command[/color] as a penalty for misconduct;
[bold]Class 2.[/bold] (NTR, Magistrate) Central Command staff may impose a demotion upon crew or command as a penalty for egregious misconduct;
[bold]Class 3.[/bold] (Magistrate) Central Command staff may order the execution of staff in the case of egregious misconduct. This should be as a last resort, after other punishments have failed to lead to reform.
# If you need to deviate,
[bold]Document document document![/bold] After action reports, calling [color=#009100]Central Command[/color] on the fabled red phone, or even praying will be heard by [color=#009100]Central Command[/color] and your actions may be excused if they were determined to be in the best interest of [color=#134975]NanoTrasen[/color].
